sentence: Rooms not as snazzy as Palazo but nevertheless pretty darn nice and spacious too
It would not make much sense for the resort to upgrade a traveler two tiers because they cheaply booked a room expecting an upgrade based on elite status
We had a terrace and a jacuzi plunge tub in the bathroom of our 55th floor room
Loved the walk in shower but the deep tub was too small
One of the televisions in the room did not work and when we called they were there to fix it within 15 minutes
Lights flashing on and off in bathroom shower does not drain
We used our terrace so much such a nice thing to have in Vegas

we found no bath robes loose light fittings and took pictures to show staff how dirty it was in various places we told them we wanted a room change and the room we originally paid forThey agreed that the room was not to an acceptable standard and we got moved eventually after having to contact them again to see if the room was ready after cleaning the views where amazing and were worth the wait to see all in all I would not stay again maybe we were not expecting the place to be so big and busy after staying at trump which is a non gaming hotel and much quieter with a much higher standard of customer service it was expensive to drink and eat in but I guess all hotels on the strip are the same when it comes to cost
There were not any handles in the shower and it was a little slippery though so do be aware if you are injured disabled
Since I wore my slipper all the time when I used the bathroom I just did not ask the staff to clean it
Beautiful room and people in the casino
it is well laid out especially as it relates to the parking garage and the rooms
The food at Momofuku Milk Bar Secret Pizza and even room service was incredible
Next time I visit would look to upgrade to a fountain view as the rooms at the Cosmo have a fabulous view of the belagio fountain display
our bar was always restocked and lastly the shower is one of the best I have been in
We had a terrace studio fountain view
We booked a regular room and upon our arrival they upgraded us to an amazing suite over looking the Belagio fountains
The pool was easily accessible as well and the technology services were fun to use within the room
The corner suit was large with two bedrooms and cake with a rarity in Vegas
Best Location and Stunning Views of the Belagio Fountains
